oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Swearing-in ceremony of Alf Rutherford, 1962 September 01
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Alfred “Alf” G. Rutherford (center), who was sworn into office of the Circuit Court Clerk, on September 1, 1962 in Nashville, Tennessee. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Rutherford, Alf G.
